title: Part  1 - The Jewel in the Lotus: Cultivating Compassion (2018-10-24)
itunes:title: Part  1 - The Jewel in the Lotus: Cultivating Compassion
description: Part 1 - The Jewel in the Lotus: Cultivating Compassion (2018-10-24) - The compassion that arises from mindful awareness can heal our inner wounds, interpersonal conflict and the suffering in our world. These two talks focus on cultivating self-compassion and compassion for others. They look at the blocks to compassion and accessible powerful practices that awaken the full wisdom and tenderness of our hearts.
